readme: ![React Query Header](https://github.com/tannerlinsley/react-query/raw/main/media/repo-dark.png) ## Note You're looking at the v3 version of react-query. Starting with v4, react-query is now available as [@tanstack/react-query](https://www.npmjs.com/package/@tanstack/react-query) Find the docs at https://tanstack.com/query/latest
